snippet: Despite vicious rhetoric in politics and a rash of anti-Muslim crimes across the country, I felt safe. Until now.
abstract: Op-Ed article by journalist Mustafa Hameed warns of growing anti-Muslim hatred in United States, which has spiked as Republican presidential candidates seem to eagerly vilify Muslims; relates how mosque his family attends in Plainfield, Ind, was defaced with anti-Muslim graffiti; calls on all Americans to speak out against such hatred and fear-mongering.
lead_paragraph: Despite vicious rhetoric in politics and a rash of anti-Muslim crimes across the country, I felt safe. Until now.

headline.main: When the Tide of Islamophobia Reached My Hometown Mosque
